channel.title: .jar file?
channel.description: is it possible to put all the files in a .jar file after you compile and somehow run the .jar and have the server start? if so, how might one go about doing this? Thanks for any help :]

is it possible to put all the files in a .jar file after you compile and somehow run the .jar and have the server start? if so, how might one go about doing this? Thanks for any help :]

i’ve seen some dumbass ideas on here… but this is the most brilliant dumbass idea ive ever heard of…

item.title: .jar file?
item.dc:creator: @jkicool jkicool
item.description:
@jkicool wrote:

Can you explain a little more because i’m confused on what you are trying to go about but if your talkin about jaring a server then no because the jar the whole jar would be constantly changing due to players saving and instead of one folder changing the whole jar file would change because it is in a Jar archive but you can make a Gui(Graphic User Interface) like many people have done Also known as (Server Control Panel)

Read full topic
